summary:
The Chrysler Building is a famous tall building (skyscraper) in New York City, designed in the Art Deco style. It was the tallest building in the world for a short time in 1930. Walter Chrysler, from the car company, built it as an investment for his kids.

The building is known for its unique look, with a steel frame and lots of brick. People have different opinions about its design, but many think it's a great example of Art Deco architecture. It's now a historic landmark in New York.
title: Chrysler Building
